answers.answer: Hello there are many things that could cause this alcohol brings on the onset everytime? Does this happen when no alcohol is invovled.  Is it possible for her weight and height that she might be consuming more than she thinks or has she counted them to be sure.  It is possible that she is having a reaction to the alcohol some people can not handle so much or even to little I have a friend who is diabetic when he driks this will throw off his blood sugar and this to happens convulsions etc.  First off some health departments in your county will offer free blood screenings for  a fasting blood sugar start there sometimes you pay a small fee but much cheaper than doctor.  If you can check the blood sugar with her moms glucometer take it in the morning after fasting for 12 hours no food or drink. Should be below 120 if higher she should see a doctor diabetes can cause all kinds of silent problems kidney failure heart trouble check that first.  Good luck
